name: Snake in Endless Mirror
description:
A classic web based retro like monochrome 2d roguelike rage platformer without goals but with small twist. Your health bar might be suddenly mirrored 😃

> WARNING: Full health can cause an instant death

  1. Use arrow key to move around (only when playing)
  2. You will get 🧃cal each time you move
  3. Enable WebMonetization to increase 🧃calories over time
  4. Spend your burned 🧃cal to tweak your Status

> Just restart the game by clicking gear ⚙️ button then click Exit if you stuck or fall to the abyss. The snake might not land properly and bypass the ground due to overweight 😂

objects in the game

Btw, you can also play this questionable game on mobile screen 😉

Tech Stack:

  • HTML, Typescript, CSS 🤘
  • excalibur@0.25.0-alpha.39 (see JS console)
  • @excaliburjs/plugin-tiled (GH-162) with slight modification
  • zzfx, nipplejs, vite
  • Tiled mapeditor v1.5.0
  • Aseprite v1.2.25-dev (I'm using the JSON file produced by Export Spritesheet)
  • VSCode v1.56.0-insider + Kakoune
